text: unake paas na roopaye the aur na ek nae parivaar ka bhaar uthaane kee himmat par jaageshvaree ne triyahath se kaam liya aur is shakti ke saamane puroosh ko jhukana pada
vah kaee baar pati aur saas se saashchary poochh chukee thee kya yahaan koee naukar nahin hai jaalapa ke ghar doodhdaheeghee kee kamee nahin thee
hato to zara main bistar khol doon
rama ke parichiton mein ek ramesh baaboo myoonisipal bord mein hed klark the
naatak kee pareeksha chaarpaanch ghante tak hotee rahatee hai baraat kee pareeksha ke lie keval itane hee minaton ka samay hota hai
jo roopviheen hon ve apane ko gahane se sajaen mujhe to eeshvar ne yon hee sundaree banaaya hai main gahane na pahanakar bhee buree na lagoongee
paanee aaya hee chaahata tha par rama ko ghar pahunchane kee itanee bechainee ho rahee thee ki usase rooka na gaya
rama ne hansakar kaha nahin priye vah jagah aisee nahin ki gareebon ka gala kaatana pade
ramaanaath is ichchha ka koee kaaran bhee to hoga
ramaanaath vah to karoonga hee
jab dayaanaath paraast ho jaate the to akhabaar padhane lagate the
shahajaadee ek chandrahaar ke na hone se kya hota hai bahan usakee jagah gulooband to hai
roomaal mein bele ke gajare liye hue tha
abhee to nau baje hain
khaan saahab ko vida karake rama apanee kursee par aa baitha aur ek chaparaasee se bola in logon se kaho baraamade ke neeche chale jaen
rama yon hee aath baje se pahale na uthata tha phir aaj to teen baje soya tha
yahee roteedaal gheedoodh to vah bhee khaate hain
usake teen varsh ke andar teenon ladake jaate rahe
hazaaron badebade aadamiyon se mulaakaat hai naukaree milate kya der lagatee hai haan zara achchhee jagah chaahata hoon
socho unhen kitana duhkh hoga
yah bhee baarah tole se kam na hoga

jaalapa roondhe hue svar mein bolee kaaran yahee hai ki ammaajee ise khushee se nahin de rahee hain bahut sambhav hai ki ise bhejate samay vah roee bhee hon aur isamen to koee sandeh hee nahin ki ise vaapas paakar unhen sachcha aanand hoga
dayaanaath chup ho gae
jaalapa ne tyoree chadhaakar kaha tumhaaree kasam kee hamen kuchh parava nahin hai
mahaashay dayaanaath ko jab rama ke naukar ho jaane ka haal maaloom hua to bahut khush hue
baarbaar apanee bhool par pachhataate kyon dikhaave aur tamaashe mein itane roopaye kharch kie
kyon kisee se naukaree ke lie kahate nahin ho
bheetar ka hisaab ve le sakate hain
ramaanaath kal nahin main isee vakt jaakar doteen chitthiyaan likhata hoon
jaalapa kee aankhen chandrama kee or lagee huee theen
myunisipailitee ke daphtar mein mujhe ek jagah mil gaee
raadha muskaraakar bolee jaalapa maaloom hota hai toone badee tapasya kee thee aisa chadhaav mainne aaj tak nahin dekha tha
jaageshvaree gaee jaalapa ne jaane se inkaar kiya
bhaadon mein janmaashtamee ka utsav aaya
use dekhate hee jhoola band ho gaya
magar phir kuchh sochakar uth khade hue aur ek taraph ko chal die
laala abhee aate hain to poochhatee hoon ki tumane yah kahaan kee reeti nikaalee hai aisa anarth bhee koee karata hai
vahaan kisake munh mein kaalikh lagatee
haan bhaee ab kyon aaoge premika kee raseelee baaton ka aanand yahaan kahaan choree ka kuchh pata chala
use aisa maaloom ho raha tha main chandrama kee or udee ja rahee hoon
ab apane munh kee laalee rakhane ka saara bhaar usee par tha
ramaanaath achchhee baat hai aapakee salaah hai to kar loonga
ye phuhaaren maano chintaon ko hraday se dho daalatee hain
saamane gaadiyon thelon aur ikkon ka baazaar laga hua hai
gyaarah tole se ratteebhar bhee kam nikal jae to kuchh haar jaoon yah sheradahaan to dekho kya haath kee saphaee hai jee chaahata hai kaareegar ke haath choom len
dayaanaath pachaas roopaye paate the par yahaan keval chaukabaasan karane ke lie maharee thee
mujhe to sabase badee khushee yahee hai ki ab maaloom hoga ki yahaan mera bhee koee adhikaar hai
us saral vishvaas se bharee huee aankhon ke saamane vah taak na saka
rama se bada sneh rakhate the
jaalapa mujhe pahunchaakar aana to likhana
mujhase cheezen le leejiega magar jab aap jaanate the yah naubat aaegee to itane jevar le jaane kee jaroorat hee kya thee vyarth kee vipatti mol lee
utana sun lene mein kya haani thee mainne gaanv vaalon ko tamaasha dikhaane ka theka to nahin liya tha
pocket fm pe aap sunre hai premchand ka likha upanyas gaban mere yaani kritika ke saath
ramaanaath aamadanee kee mujhe parava nahin rishvat koee achchhee cheez to hai nahin
jaalapa ne phir kaha meree sakhiyaan tumhen dekhakar mugdh ho gaee
jaalapa santusht ho gaee bolee haan tab theek hai
chaarj mein tha hee kya keval aaj kee aamadanee ka hisaab samajha dena tha
chaahate to hazaaron ke vaarenyaare karate par rishvat kee kaudee bhee haraam samajhate the
aaj kaee din se bechaare bahut vyaakul ho rahe the
rama daphtar se ghar pahuncha to chaar baj rahe the
vivaah hote hee vah itanee jald chetega isakee unhen aasha na thee
mahaashay deenadayaal ne bheja tha
maanakee ekek cheez ko nikaalnikaalakar dekhane aur dikhaane lagee
kal usaka aadamee aavega
jaalapa koee nahin agar koee hote to mujhe yon na chhod dete
jaalapa ne naak sikodakar kaha meree bala se raanee roothengee apana suhaag lengee
kya naukaree milana aasaan hai
aage bhee vahee hoga jo likha hai
ab to teree sab saadh pooree ho gaee
jaalapa aankhon mein aansoo bharakar bolee to main tumase gahanon ke lie rotee to nahin hoon
nashe kee tarang mein use aisa maaloom hua ki main sachamuch phoolon kee devee hoon
dayaanaath ne kaha bhaee tum jaano tumhaara kaam jaane
sabakee aankhen khul jaen
kal khat likhana jaroor
deenadayaal ne sandesh bheja to usako aankhensee mil gaee
doston kee badaulat shauk poora hota rahata tha
deenadayaal ek hajaar to de aae par dayaanaath ka bojh halka karane ke badale aur bhaaree kar diya
javaanee mein stree mar gaee thee doosara vivaah nahin kiya
ramaanaath main taiyaar hoon
ramaanaath ne motar par jor diya
sahasa kisee ne kaha chandrahaar nahin hai kya
rama ko is samay apane kapatvyavahaar par badee glaani ho rahee thee
jab is dhaandhalee se vyaapaaree log saikadon kee rakam dakaar jaate hain to rama biltee par ek aana lekar hee kyon santusht ho jaay jisamen aadha aana chaparaasiyon ka hai
unhen kanakauve udaate dekhakar unakee baalprakrti sajag ho jaatee thee
khoob badhbadhakar baaten kee theen
shahajaadee bolee chadhaava aisa hee hona chaahie ki dekhane vaale bhadak uthen
abhee daak ka vakt ho to lauta do
agar usane ye deengen na maaree hoteen to jaageshvaree kee tarah vah bhee saara bhaar dayaanaath par chhodakar nishchint ho jaata lekin is vakt vah apane hee banae hue jaal mein phans gaya tha
ramaanaath jee to chaahata hai doosaree baazee maat dekar jaoon magar der hogee
jaalapa ne kamare se lautakar premollasit najaron se usakee or dekha to usane munh udhar liya
kisee bade kolej ke prophasar ko itanee khyaati umrabhar mein na milatee
dochaar sau baakee rahe vah dheeredheere chuk jaenge
is tarah hansatekhelate saat varsh kat gae
raat ke das baj gae the
dayaanaath main sochata hoon use aaj kya javaab doonga main to yah vivaah karake bura phans gaya
jaalapa tadapakar bolee vah mere kaun hote hain jo unase poochhoon
paise ko to vah theekara samajhata hai kya dil hai ki vaah aur jaisa dil hai vaisee hee zabaan bhee
ab is ghar mein main kshanbhar na rookoongee
mahaashay dayaanaath jitanee umangon se byaah karane gae the utana hee hatotsaah hokar laute
baalika ke aanand kee seema na thee
kuchh log phulavaariyon ke takht dekhakar lotlot jaate the
